definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: which is the L train to Bedford.
sentences.chinese: 你要坐L線地鐵到貝德福德下車。

sentences.english: Metro line 2 to century avenue Station, about 10 min walk to the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 坐地鐵2號線世紀大道站下，步行10分鐘到旅舍。

sentences.english: The primary target for taggers in New York is the subway system.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約，“留名者”的首要目標是地鐵系統。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the in-doors air condition and the factors affecting the air quality of Guangzhou metro.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解影響廣州地鐵室內空氣質量的主要因素。

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: The pamphlet suggests getting off the bus or train one stop early.
sentences.chinese: 小冊子建議，我們應該提前一站下汽車或者地鐵。

sentences.english: I can do anything on the subway.
sentences.chinese: 我乘地鐵的時候可以做任何事情。

sentences.english: Analysis is made on wave propagation in soils under high speed train loads by two-dimensional finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 基於有限元法分析了地鐵運行引起的土的波動特性。

sentences.english: A:How long does it take to get to Times Square by subway?
sentences.chinese: 搭地鐵到時代廣場需要多長時間？

sentences.english: The station is called Beijing Station and it is on the blue circle line.
sentences.chinese: 那一站是北京站，在藍色環線地鐵線路上。

sentences.english: Do you think MTR provide enough types of MTR shops?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲地鐵所提供的車站店鋪種類足夠嗎？

sentences.english: "Xi Nan Jiao"is a transfer station. You may transfer subway line 2.
sentences.chinese: “西南角”是換乘車站，您可以換乘地鐵2號線列車。

sentences.english: The construction technique of overlapped single tunnels is the first in China to adopt in Shenzhen subway engineering.
sentences.chinese: 單洞重疊隧道施工技術是深圳地鐵在國內第一次採用。

sentences.english: This article trades a special study about spatial design for subway.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於地鐵換乘空間設計的一項專題研究。

sentences.english: because I have to walk a really long way from the subway to get to the Yoga studio.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我從地鐵到瑜伽工作室要走很長的一段路。

sentences.english: S: Yes, you can. Bring your card and receipt to replace it at Lao Jie Station.
sentences.chinese: 可以拿收據到老街地鐵站換。

definition: bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
to take the car, bus, train etc
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
